success.title: **Success!
success.description: **Installed activity {title}. Now you can use it in your business processes.

success.title: **Success!
success.description: **Uninstalled activity {title}. You must ensure that business processes are working properly.

confirm.title: **Confirm uninstallation {title}?
confirm.description: **The activity will become unavailable in all business processes.

advice.p1: **An error has been identified in generating activity data.
advice.p2: **Please contact the app’s technical support team — our specialists will resolve the issue promptly.
